greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A028242(A110654(n)).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,1,-1).
formula: a(n) = floor(n/4) - (n mod 4) mod 3 + floor((2 + n mod 4)/2).
a(n + 4) = a(n) + 1 so a(n + 8) = 2 * a(n + 4) - a(n). - _David A. Corneth_, Oct 02 2017
program: (PARI) first(n) = my(c = res = [1,0,0,2]); for(i=1,(n-1)\4, c += [1,1,1,1]; res = concat(res, c)); res \\ _David A. Corneth_, Oct 02 2017
(MAGMA) b:= func< n | (1 + 2*n + 3*(-1)^n)/4 >; [b(Ceiling(n/2)): n in [0..100]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, May 22 2019
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 05 2005
